programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Last Resort
programme.desc: Haunted by a colleague's suicide and grappling with guilt, Helen Dorn confronts the unspoken accusations of her fellow officers. At the same time, she is assigned to solve a medical student's murder, where she soon uncovers their double life.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isn’t allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: Monsoon Baby
programme.desc: After years of failed IVF treatments, Nina and Mark turn to an Indian surrogate. As they anxiously await their baby, the surrogate vanishes, prompting the desperate couple to embark on a frantic search for her and their unborn child.

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Red Cloth
programme.desc: A fatal arson incident draws Helen Dorn into a far-left extremist community, who has targeted wealthy real estate agent Ralph Wagner. While they deny any involvement in the crime, it is indeed suspicious that they were previously almost ousted by Wagner.

programme.title: Road To Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: Heavenly Nomadic
programme.desc: A family of nomads dwelling high in the mountains of Kyrgyzstan doesn't need any of the conveniences of modern civilization in order to be happy. But progress is creeping into their lives regardless, destroying legends and traditions as it comes.

programme.title: Victoria Must Go
programme.desc: Hedvig and Henrik's new stepmother Victoria is annoying and constantly introducing new rules. They decide to hire a hitman to get rid of her, and end up persuading a very reluctant immigrant, Carl, to do the job.

programme.title: Jeanny: The Fifth Girl
programme.desc: In a picturesque tiny town near Vienna, young girls have been vanishing without a trace for years. Jeanny has just fallen in love with a mysterious man. But when she notices signs of a dark side in him, she becomes suspicious. Will she be the next victim?

programme.title: Tokyo Fianc ée
programme.desc: A charming and tender tale of young love and cultural discovery. Amélie, a Japanophile young Belgian woman in Tokyo falls into a whirlwind romance with Rinri, a Francophile Japanese student.

programme.title: All The Songs We Never Sang
programme.desc: Rebellious teen Natsumi ventures from Tokyo to a small island to meet her aunt and learn the art of pearl diving (but secretly to find a treasure she was told about as a child).

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Running On Sand
programme.desc: When an Eritrean refugee about to be deported from Israel is mistaken for the Nigerian striker just signed to a struggling soccer team, his fate depends on the team’s success in this charming, socially relevant dramedy.

programme.title: I'm Not In Love
programme.desc: After receiving a marriage ultimatum from a woman he's not sure he truly loves, Rob is up against the clock to realise he should stop looking for the fabled 'Miss Right' and learn to see what's right in front of him.
